text: Why aren't more cancer ctrs, hospitals, & #oncology practices advocating for ppl w/ #cancer to get #COVID19 #vaccine? This poll (N=87) suggests only about 1/3 are. #OncTwitter pls step up! Our pts' risk of hosp & death is similar to ppl in their 80s & they often can't #StayHome. https://t.co/aXVSHrAMex
